name: #003 Sandbox to Test Racing Mode For 2 Players
name_original: #003 Sandbox to Test Racing Mode For 2 Players
description:
--- REMEMBER --- 
You MUST click inside the game for it to have focus so that your keyboard presses will be recognized.

Left player
Z key  fires your thruster
(that's all you can do)Right player
/ key  fires your thruster
(that's all you can do)<ESC> 
restarts the game
(for when you  get stuck)

See the video below  explaining how to play. 
The player in the upper left wants to get down to the bottom right and race around counter-clockwise.
The player in the upper right wants to get down to the bottom left and race around clockwise.
Right now there isn't any scoring or checkpoints -- it's just a demo sandbox for what a race would be like between Uncontrollable Spaceships.

You can follow me on my website 81766.com for articles about game development and publishing (sign up for the email list!) or you can follow me here on itch.io. Follow this account https://uncontrollablespaceship.itch.io/ for Uncontrollable Spaceship development and https://81766.itch.io/ for everything I'm working on.
